REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0897 reute u f BC-/PENNEY-<JCP>-SETS-ST 03-31 0047

TEXT.TITLE: PENNEY <JCP> SETS STOCK SPLIT, RAISES QUARTERLY
TEXT.BODY: J.C. Penney Co Inc said its board declared a two-for-one stock split and raised the quarterly dividend 12 cts per share on a presplit basis to 74 cts. Both are payable May One to holders of record April 10. Reuter
